title: New Zed Skin Idea
body:
So I have an idea for a really cool zed skin 
So he would be a sort of black/grey colour that has Blue "Veins" Running Though the body. the colour would change as he uses his W and his R from blue to orange/yellow to red. the blades that he has at the end of his hands would be like the "Veins" changing colour as he uses his ability's. the shurikens on his back would have a dark red centre this the would turn into a lighter red at the ends and look more transparent like a hologram (Think of Athenas Shield from borderlands the Pre-Sequel). 

Now for his ability's starting with his W.

His W would instead of throwing a shadow would throw a small disk that would land on the ground and would display a zed "hologram" instead of shadow that would be a transparent Red (Like Pulse-fire Ezreals Dance With a Different colour) When he Switches spots with his "Hologram" he will sink into his own disk and come out of the other one. OR he ill simply switch like he does now but as he switches Red "Hologram Squares (read his E for more details on Red Squares).

His Q Would throw the "Athena Shield shurikens) out from his back with a light glow coming from the back of it (Like Arcade Hecarim has a rainbow glow behind him when he uses his E) The Glow would be a Light Red.

His E would send up red Holographic Squares (Like yasuo in a small way) and Be Light Red. 

Still Figuring out his Ultimate But it would have something to Do with the "Holographic Disks) and the X would be Orange

Still no name (cyber,Advanced,PROJECT,Holographic zed?)

This would be a 1350RP skin 

Any Reference to anyone else's skin ideas is Completely accidental :)

thanks for reading and i would love Criticism but please Be Nice :)

(I'm still working on ideas so i may change this) {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}}Dont Be Cold Hearted :P  {{item:3110}}
